promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong parrot electric-type pokemon with golden feathers. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or parrot. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Goldthundera, a a gigantic strong parrot electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Cyber Shock. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "parrot", "electric" or "Goldthundera". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, parrot-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Residing in stormy areas, this colossal, golden-feathered chatterbox delivers jolts via its Cyber Shock skill.
